```python
import gmpy2,libnum
from Crypto.Util.number import getPrime
from secret import flag

e = 0x10001
p = getPrime(1024)
q = gmpy2.next_prime(p)
n = p * q
print("n =",n)
m = libnum.s2n(flag)
c = pow(m,e,n)
print("c =", c)

# n = 
# c = 
```

题目提供一段python脚本，已知n、e、c求解m。

利用RsaCtfTool.py求解p和q。

```shell
python3  RsaCtfTool.py --createpub -n  -e 0x10001

python3 RsaCtfTool.py --publickey test.pem --private
```
